title: Unexpected Partners
description: HAYLEY MCALLISTER is fiercely determined and focused and has spent her life being groomed to take over her father's business empire. With a pair of unusual green eyes, and an almost cold outlook on life, which	has earned her the nick name 'Ice Queen', she has vowed to never let any man turn her into a love-sick-girl; until the day the dark and devastatingly sexy SHAY MARASCINO steps into her world, shattering the ice and taking her sanity and half of her company, with her father's blessing.			When a shocking secret is revealed, Hayley's reaction causes a chain of events that threatens to destroy everything she holds dear…how much can one person forgive?"Life can be so unexpected…							…and love even more so..."
author: Sterna Kruger
